landing.bio: I am a Software Development Engineer with a strong hold on data structures and algorithms in C/C++ and Java. Currently I am working at Amazon India with the Alexa Product & Tech team. Always on lookout for opportunities to utilize my skills and achieve personal and professional growth while being resourceful, innovative and dynamic in my work that leads to a learning experience.

experience.aboutWork: I interned with the Alexa team building awesome software for Amazon's internal customers. I primarily worked on the backend services writing code in Java. We utilized Amazon Web Services and developed on top of that to provide customers with delightful experiences. My internship project was to automate a manual workflow that was causing a bottleneck in the pipeline. I saved 12 hrs/week of manual effort.

experience.organization: Central Pension Accounting Office, NIC Govt. of India
experience.aboutWork: Worked on e-Scroll Auto-Audit which is a auditing software built on top of Django framework with Python and PHP. Designed the user authentication feature to work in sync with the existing MS-SQL database. Used MD5 hashing technique. Designed Django model for existing tables in the database. Worked on redesigning the existing components of the app. Deployed the app to production.

Lead the central of my college in planning and executing the events/fest of the college. Looked after the logisitcs requirement for the fest of our college. Worked in a team environment and guided my team of juniors.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a software developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. I am passionate about photography and film making and aspire to start a YouTube channel of my own one day.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the consumer tech field like new products and apps via blogs and podcasts.

awards.awardDetail: SQL and Relational Databases by IBM (04/2019)
Certificate of Achievement in C++ DS Algo by Coding Blocks [Pitampura , Delhi]
NPTEL online certification in Introduction to Modern Aplication Development (Elite)
Reached to top 120 teams across India in Deloitte TechnoUtsav 2.0(Round 2 Phase 3)
2 time silver medalist in iIO cyber olympiad conducted by Silver Zone
Won the price of best Technocrat of the school for the year 2015-16 by former chairman of ISRO Mr. G. Madhavan Nair
Ranked 8th in classroom program of C++ at Coding BLocks
Secured 98% marks in class XII C++ board exam
